setup.__GAME_SETUP: Start Temperament must be below win Temperament. Lose Temperament is always 0

responses.win: Germany has become too much of a nuisance, their repeated threats against our nation have convinced me to join the Allies and declare war on the Central Powers
responses.lose: I have decided to stay out of the War, you points did not please me.
responses.veryhappy: Overall, Your points are incredibly valid...it is highly likely that I will assist you in the war.
responses.happy: Overall, you may see my assistance in this war. It is a possibility.
responses.angry: Overall, Your words are not appreciated,
responses.veryangry: Overall, Your words are convincing me to stay out of this war.
responses.good: I think I am getting better, because of that statement.
responses.bad: That statement may keep the US out of war.
responses.stale: You've already asked me that, haven't you?. It won't change my mind.
